column2: "No, that was amazing! Your moves have been burned into my mind. I'm jealous of what good experience you're gaining!"

"So I guess in that situation, the best
thing to do is to move in real quick,
then smack the enemy nice and hard, huh?"

"I'm gonna remember that for future use!
Thanks, friend!"

"いやほんとスゴかったなぁー！
動きがオレの目に焼き付いてるよ。
いい経験を積めてうらやましいぜ！"

"やっぱ、あの状況だったら
ビッと入り込んで、ガシーッと
攻めてくのが王道だよな。"

"オレも参考にさせてもらうぜ！
ありがとな！"
